mtte.browse: Browse folders and select an icon
mtte.clipboardImageToolTip: Copy path into clipboard. You can then reuse elsewhere.
mtte.clipboardSoundSuccess: Sound path successfully copied into clipboard!
mtte.configDefaultEffectRadiusHint: Default effect radius when dragging and dropping a sound on a scene
mtte.configSoundboardColumnsHint: Number of shortcuts rendered on one row on the soundboard
mtte.configSoundboardHideUIHint: Hides the controls, navigation and logo when SoundBoard UI is opened. Improves the look-and-feel but could be annoying if you need both.
mtte.configSoundboardRowsHint: Number of rows on the soundboard
mtte.configSoundpadDownloadSoundsHint: Download sounds before playing them from the SoundPad. This require supporting Tabletop Audio (TTA) with tier '5$ / month' or more. When disabled, sounds are played directly from Moulinette Cloud and expire after 24 hours. You always need to play them from the SoundPad then.
mtte.configSoundpadHideTTAWarningHint: A warning is displayed everytime a sound is played from Tabletop Audio but you are supporting TTA with 3$/mo tier. You can disable this warning with this configuration. The warning remains visible inside the console logs.
mtte.configureSourcesToolTip: Configure the sources that Moulinette uses during the indexing process.
mtte.customReferencesPacks: Packs available on Internet (you can download)
mtte.customReferencesToolTip: Moulinette provides a list of references (ex: free tokens available to download).
mtte.deleteFavoriteContent: Please confirm that you REALLY want to delete slot '{from}'
mtte.deletePlayListContent: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist Moulinette Soundboard?
mtte.errorChooseSlot: Choose a slot for the favorite
mtte.errorDoubleIconDefined: You must EITHER choose a Font Awesome icon OR a local image but not both!
mtte.errorEnterShortText: You must provide a short text
mtte.favoriteCheckedToolTip: Add all selected sounds to 1 soundboard slot. When executed, this slot will play 1 sound among them randomly.
mtte.favoriteDescr: This action will store the selected sound as favorite. Choose a slot and specify a short text or icon to be rendered. Any existing favorite will be overriden.
mtte.favoriteIconDescr: You can choose to display a Font Awesome icon OR browse and choose your own icon. If you don't choose any icon, the short text will be displayed.
mtte.moveFavorite: Move favorite: do you want to overwrite?
mtte.moveFavoriteContent: You are moving '{from}' to an occupied slot ({to}). Do you want to overwrite (yes) the destination or swap (no) positions?
mtte.noSoundPads: No soundpad is available to you. Check that your Patreon account is linked and that you support TableTop Audio!
mtte.playCheckedToolTip: Creates a new playlist with the selected sounds and plays them.
mtte.previewSound: Listen to sound or music (without playing it in Foundry)
mtte.showCaseAssets: There are {count} assets matching your criteria on Moulinette Cloud. Click to preview them.
mtte.showSoundPadsToolTip: Opens the SoundPad UI (populated from Moulinette Cloud)
mtte.slotNotAssigned: This slot has not been yet defined! Opening Moulinette Audio…
mtte.soundboardDeleteWarning: This action will clear all slots of this soundboard and cannot be un-done. Please confirm!
mtte.soundboardDesc: Click to play a sound from your board. Add sounds to the board by making them from Moulinette Sounds. Right-click to edit/delete. The size of the board is configurable.
mtte.soundboardImportTooltip: Import a soundboard from a file
mtte.soundsDescription: Search provided by Moulinette. Soundtracks provided by GM/admin.
mtte.specialSearchFailed: Something went wrong during the request/search
mtte.ttaWarning: By supporting Tabletop Audio (TTA) with tier "3$ per month", sounds are NOT downloaded and the URL will expire after 24 hours. Make sure to always play them from this UI. If you want to build playlists or use sounds in scenes, you need to support TTA with a higher tier. You can disable this warning in the configuration.
